titles: A sermon preached at Barstaple vpon occasion of the late happy success of Gods Church in forraine parts. By G.H. D.D.
author: Hakewill, George, 1578-1649.
publisher: Printed [by R. Badger] for R. Allot, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
